title: Northeast Natural Energy - EIG Partners
description: Northeast Natural Energy (the "Company" or "NNE") is a private oil and gas company headquartered in Charleston, WV, focused on the acquisition and development of natural gas reserves within the Appalachian Basin.
cleaned_text: OUR INVESTMENTS 03/01/2017 Active Northeast Natural Energy Northeast Natural Energy (the "Company" or "NNE") is a private oil and gas company headquartered in Charleston, WV, focused on the acquisition and development of natural gas reserves within the Appalachian Basin.
